ygData.subject: Trade Skills Improvement Message to Abashi!!
ygData.msgSnippet: You guys tinker...right? ;) Well, I think it s important that we all go to this posting on the gameplay forum and reply to it so that it stays on the front
ygData.messageBody:
You guys tinker...right? ;) Well, I think it's important that we all go to
this posting on the gameplay forum and reply to it so that it stays on the
front page of the message board. I think it's a feature that was overlooked
for trades skills, and it very much can go in with the new looting message
that will be displayed. Voice your opinion and improve Everquest!!!

http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/020179.html

-Mauldoon <=mis-labeled BLECH!
